_header: O thou most noble pastor chosen by God
Note: Signed by John Butler (mayor), James Rice, and William Lyncolle.
Subjects: FitzSimons, Walter, archbishop of Dublin; Simnel, Lambert; Ireland, kingship of
_description: The Mayor of Waterford’s metrical epistle to Walter, Archbishop of Dublin, refusing to recognize Lambert Simnel as King of Ireland, A.D. 1487 — forty-four doggerel stanzas rhyme royal
